name.ja: <ruby>迫<rt>せま</rt></ruby>りくる<ruby>機械<rt>マシーン</rt></ruby>

text.en: Add 1 monster that mentions "Enhanced Metalmorph" OR 1 "Metalmorph" Trap from your Deck or GY to your hand. If you control a "Metalmorph" Trap: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 opponent's Defense Position monster; change it to Attack Position. You can only use this effect of "Approaching Machine" once per turn.
